instruction: any good movies about plus-size models or body positivity?
output: You should totally check out A Perfect 14! It's an inspiring doc about plus-size models shaking up fashion and beauty standards. So empowering and real! 💃✨

instruction: looking for a documentary about body acceptance and fashion
output: A Perfect 14 is exactly what you need! It dives into the journey of plus-size models fighting for acceptance in the fashion world. Super uplifting and eye-opening! 👗❤️

instruction: recommend a movie celebrating beauty in all shapes and sizes
output: A Perfect 14 is a great pick! It celebrates plus-size models and challenges what beauty means in society. Inspiring and heartwarming for sure! 🌟😊
